translations: 无心地；不自觉地；偶然地

sentences.translation: 他的左眼皮不由自主地跳着。

sentences.sentence: He cried involuntarily, as he looked at East Gate, which, in those days, was at the end of East Street.
sentences.translation: 他望着东门不由自主地叫了起来，那时候东门就在东街的尽头。

sentences.sentence: His thoughts were so elastic, his heart so tender; and involuntarily he picked one of the nearest flowers.
sentences.translation: 他的思维真跳跃，他的心真温柔；他不由自主地摘了一朵最近的花。
